casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Paul Dewayne CUMMINGS. No. 1A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 7, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Amy Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of August 2006 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of August 2006."
